constitutive_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'comp_mooney_rivlin, comp_neo_hook, comp_neo_hook_plastic, elastic_plastic, hypo_elastic, elastic_plastic_hp, ideal_gas, membrane, murnaghanMPM, mw_visco_elastic, rigid, shell_CNH, trans_iso_hyper, visco_plastic, soil_foam, visco_scram, visco_trans_iso_hyper, water, TH_water, kayenta, hypo_elastic_fortran, diamm, cnh_mms, cnh_damage, cnhp_damage, UCNH, program_burn, jwlpp_mpm, p_alpha, nonlocal_drucker_prager, Arenisca, Arenisca3, Arenisca4, ArenaSoil, camclay, TongeRameshPTR, rf_elastic_plastic'

equation_of_state.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'default_hyper, default_hypo, mie_gruneisen, mie_gruneisen_energy'

melting_temp_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_Tm, linear_Tm, scg_Tm, bps_Tm'

flow_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'isotropic_hardening, johnson_cook, mts_model, preston_tonks_wallace, steinberg_cochran_guinan, zerilli_armstrong, zerilli_armstrong_polymer'

shear_modulus_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_shear, mts_shear, np_shear, ptw_shear, scg_shear'

specific_heat_model.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'constant_Cp, cubic_Cp, copper_Cp, steel_Cp'

stability_check.attribute1: type REQUIRED STRING 'acoustic, becker, drucker, drucker_becker, none'
